headline: PBF Energy Plans Staged Restart of Fire-Damaged Martinez Refinery
summary: PBF's Martinez refinery, shut since the fire incident on Feb. 1, is set to restart in phases. The first stage will begin in Q2 2025, while full operations are expected by Q4.

raw.headline: PBF Energy Plans Staged Restart of Fire-Damaged Martinez Refinery
raw.summary: PBF's Martinez refinery, shut since the fire incident on Feb. 1, is set to restart in phases. The first stage will begin in Q2 2025, while full operations are expected by Q4.

headline: ExxonMobil Faces $214M Cost Recovery Dispute in Guyana
summary: XOM and Guyana are set to discuss a $214M tax dispute after an audit flagged potential cost overstatements at the Stabroek block. The talks could impact XOM's cost recovery terms.

raw.headline: ExxonMobil Faces $214M Cost Recovery Dispute in Guyana
